complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement complete server validation for MCP task-master-ai
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand upon existing infrastructure to implement comprehensive server validation system.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity score due to the need to integrate various aspects of server functionality, including data consistency and security checks. Additionally, the implementation requires a combination of server-side scripting and database-level checks, which adds to the overall complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down design into smaller subtasks: (1) Identify validation layer components, (2) Develop detailed architecture documentation, (3) Define interfaces and interactions with existing infrastructure, (4) Create data flow diagrams.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity score due to the need to develop a comprehensive design document outlining the validation layer's architecture. However, the number of recommended subtasks is higher due to the complexity of the task.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Data Format Verification and Validation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Expand upon data format verification and validation: (1) Develop server-side code using Node.js, (2) Implement database-level checks to ensure data integrity.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Moderate complexity score due to the need to write server-side code and implement database-level checks. However, the number of recommended subtasks is lower compared to other tasks.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Develop Comprehensive Test Cases and Integration Testing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down comprehensive test cases into smaller subtasks: (1) Develop unit tests for individual components, (2) Create integration tests simulating real-world scenarios, (3) Write end-to-end tests to verify entire system functionality.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: High complexity score due to the need to develop a multi-step approach with various testing strategies. The number of recommended subtasks is higher due to the complexity and scope of the task.
